text: @BernieSanders @AOC @IlhanMN @RashidaTlaib @grandson This is hysterical! The people who are criticizing Trump for speaking on the coronavirus because he’s not a scientist are now putting themselves forward as scientists, so we should listen to them? What a bunch of idiots
